name: Escape If You Can: Zombie Escape challenge games
name_original: Escape If You Can: Zombie Escape challenge games
description:
Are you ready for the most uncommon room escape game you have every played?

The city was destroyed by zombies.You are infected with the zombie virus, because you leave the hospital by a zombie scratched.You have to find a vaccine right away.You have to fight in doomsday.
You need to run up your brain.You need to solve problems one by one.
Find vaccine! And...survival!

Magnificent puzzles,Stunning story
Beautifully rendered backgrounds that will pull you in and never let you go!
Beautiful soundtrack perfectly suited to this eerie and haunting world.
Auto-save feature , never lose your progress again.
